result.title: Microdroplet-based environmental simulator
result.description: This will be based on a fully autonomous chemical robot system that is able to generate random physicochemical inputs in microdroplet scale. The droplet behaviours will then be analysed, and ranked using a fitness function. This process is continued through iterated generations. This allows inspecting how the genotype is modulated through an envirotype to express the phenotype of interest.
